document.docAuthor: Kaczmarek, Łukasz, Bartels, Paul J., Roszkowska, Milena & Nelson, Diane R.

Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Adriatic Sea: 29 , Alboran Sea: 2 , Balearic Sea: 2 , Celtic Sea: 2 , Indian Ocean: 4 , Ionian Sea: 29 , Ligurian Sea: 1 , Mediterranean Sea: 1 , Tyrrhenian Sea: 17 ;
total: 87 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 27 : 2 , FAO 37 : 81 , FAO 51 : 4 ;
total: 87 .

Remarks: This is a frequently reported species described for the first time from the marine water pumping system at the Marine Biological Station in Roscoff, France . Later it was reported from intertidal and subtidal localities (including marine caves) mainly in the Mediterranean basin, but also from a few localities in the Indian Ocean. It has been reported from different types of sand and detritus.
